TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XmlConvert extends System.Object
public ref class XmlConvert abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlConvert extends System.Object

summary.span: 对 XML 名称进行编码和解码，并提供方法在公共语言运行时类型和 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 类型之间进行转换。

span.span: Encodes and decodes XML names, and provides methods for converting between common language runtime types and XML Schema definition language (XSD) types.

summary.span: 转换数据类型时，返回的值是独立于区域设置的。

span.span: When converting data types, the values returned are locale-independent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在功能上等效于 类，但它支持 XML 标准。The class is functionally equivalent to the class, but it supports XML standards. 类型系统基于 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构类型，并且返回的值总是与区域设置无关。The type system is based on the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema type, and the values returned are always locale-independent. ## 编码和解码Encoding and decoding 根据 W3C [XML 1.0 建议](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)，元素和属性名称或 ID 值限制为一定范围的 XML 字符。Element and attribute names or ID values are limited to a range of XML characters according to the W3C [XML 1.0 recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/). 当名称包含无效字符时，可以使用此类中的 和 方法将它们转换为有效的 XML 名称。When names contain invalid characters, you can use the and methods in this class to translate them into valid XML names. 例如，如果想要在数据库中使用列标题 "Order Detail"，则数据库允许两个词之间的空间。For example, if you want to use the column heading "Order Detail" in a database, the database allows the space between the two words. 但是，在 XML 中，"Order" 和 "Detail" 之间的空格被视为无效的 XML 字符。However, in XML, the space between "Order" and "Detail" is considered an invalid XML character. 您必须将其转换为转义的十六进制编码，以后再对其进行解码。You have to convert it into an escaped hexadecimal encoding and decode it later. 可以将 方法与 类结合使用，以确保要写入的名称是有效的 XML 名称。You can use the method with the class to ensure the names being written are valid XML names. 下面C#的代码将名称 "Order Detail" 转换为有效的 XML 名称并将该元素写入 `My order`。The following C# code converts the name "Order Detail" into a valid XML name and writes the element `My order`. ```csharp writer.WriteElementString(XmlConvert.EncodeName("Order Detail"),"My order"); ``` 以下 方法执行编码和解码。The following methods perform encoding and decoding. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||采用一个名称，并返回已编码的名称以及由转义字符串替换的任何无效字符。Takes a name and returns the encoded name along with any invalid character that is replaced by an escape string. 此方法允许任意位置中的冒号，这意味着根据[XML 1.0 建议中的 W3C 命名空间](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)，该名称可能仍然无效。This method allows colons in any position, which means that the name may still be invalid according to the W3C [Namespaces in XML 1.0 recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/).| ||采用一个名称，并返回已编码的名称。Takes a name and returns the encoded name.| ||与 相同，不同之处在于它还会编码冒号字符，以确保名称可用作命名空间限定名称的 `LocalName` 部分。Same as except that it also encodes the colon character, guaranteeing that the name can be used as the `LocalName` part of a namespace-qualified name.| ||反转对所有编码方法的转换。Reverses the transformation for all the encoding methods.| ## 名称验证Name validation 类包含两种方法，这些方法检查元素或属性名称中的字符，并验证该名称是否符合 W3C [XML 1.0 建议](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)所设置的规则：The class contains two methods that check the characters in an element or attribute name and verify that the name conforms to the rules set by the W3C [XML 1.0 recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/): - 检查字符，并验证该名称是否有效。 checks the characters and verifies that the name is valid. 如果名称有效，则方法返回名称，如果不是，则引发异常。The method returns the name if it's valid, and throws an exception if it isn't. - 执行相同的验证，但接受非限定名称。 performs the same validation, but accepts non-qualified names. 包含其他方法，这些方法可验证标记、空白字符、公共 Id 和其他字符串。The contains additional methods that validate tokens, white-space characters, public IDs, and other strings. ## 数据类型转换Data type conversion 还提供了一些方法，使你能够将数据从字符串转换为强类型数据类型。 also provides methods that enable you to convert data from a string to a strongly typed data type. 例如， 方法将字符串转换为其 等效的字符串。For example, the method converts a string to its equivalent. 这很有用，因为 类中的大多数方法都将数据作为字符串返回。This is useful because most methods in the class return data as a string. 读取数据后，可以将数据转换为正确的数据类型，然后再使用。After the data is read, it can be converted to the proper data type before being used. 重载通过将强类型数据转换为字符串来提供互补的操作。The overloads provide the complementary operation by converting strongly typed data to strings. 例如，当您想要将数据添加到网页中的文本框时，这非常有用。For example, this is useful when you want to add the data to text boxes on a webpage. 在数据转换过程中不考虑区域设置。Locale settings are not taken into account during data conversion. 数据类型基于 XML 架构（XSD）数据类型。The data types are based on the XML Schema (XSD) data types.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string DecodeName(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function DecodeName (name As String) As String

summary.span: 该方法完成 和 方法的反向操作。

span.span: This method does the reverse of the and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以下规则对名称进行解码：The names are decoded using the following rules: - 名称从左到右进行解码。Names are decoded from left to right. - 任何序列 \_x*HHHH*\_ （其中 HHHH 代表有效的四位十六进制 UCS-2 代码），未解码的序列转换为相应的 Unicode 2.1 （如果应用程序支持，则为 unicode 3.0）。Any sequence \_x*HHHH*\_ (where HHHH stands for a valid, four-digit hexadecimal UCS-2 code) that has not been decoded is transformed into the corresponding Unicode 2.1 (Unicode 3.0 if supported by the application) character. - 不识别任何 shortforms。No shortforms are recognized. 无需翻译即可传递它们。They are passed on without translation. 例如，不解码 \_x20\_ 或 \_\_。For example, \_x20\_ or \_\_ are not decoded. > [!NOTE] > 字符的实际编码是特定于应用程序的。The actual encoding of the character is application-specific. 例如，Order\_x0020\_详细信息将变为订单详细信息。For example, Order\_x0020\_Details becomes Order Details. 甚至会识别和解码 XML 名称中无效的转义字符。Even escaped characters that are invalid in XML names will be recognized and decoded. ## Examples 下面的示例对名称进行编码和解码。The following example encodes and decodes names. [!code-cpp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CPP/convert.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CS/convert.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/VB/convert.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string EncodeLocalName(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function EncodeLocalName (name As String) As String

summary.span: 将名称转换为有效的 XML 本地名称。

span.span: Converts the name to a valid XML local name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法类似于 方法，不同之处在于它对冒号字符进行编码，这可保证该名称可用作命名空间限定名的本地名称部分。This method is similar to the method except that it encodes the colon character, which guarantees that the name can be used as the local name part of a namespace qualified name. 例如，如果向此方法传递了无效名称 a:b，它将返回\_x003a\_b，这是一个有效的本地名称。For example, if you passed this method the invalid name a:b, it returns a\_x003a\_b, which is a valid local name. 如果 `name` `null` 或 ，则该方法将返回相同的值。If `name` is `null` or , the method returns the same value. ## Examples 下面的示例对名称进行编码和解码。The following example encodes and decodes names. [!code-cpp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CPP/convert.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CS/convert.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/VB/convert.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string EncodeName(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function EncodeName (name As String) As String

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 将名称转换为有效的 XML 名称。

span.span: Converts the name to a valid XML name.

returns.span: 任何无效的字符都由转义字符串替换。

span.span: The name with any invalid characters replaced by an escape string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法转换需要映射到 XML 名称的无效字符（如空格或半角片假名），而不支持或不存在架构。This method translates invalid characters, such as spaces or half-width Katakana, that need to be mapped to XML names without the support or presence of schemas. 无效字符转换为转义数值实体编码。The invalid characters are translated into escaped numeric entity encodings. 转义符为 "\_"。The escape character is "\_". 不符合[xml 1.0 规范（第四版）建议](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)的任何 XML 名称字符都将转义为 \_xHHHH\_。Any XML name character that does not conform to the [XML 1.0 spec (fourth edition) recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/) is escaped as \_xHHHH\_. HHHH 字符串表示字符的四位十六进制 UCS-2 代码，最高有效位为第一顺序。The HHHH string stands for the four-digit hexadecimal UCS-2 code for the character in most significant bit first order. 例如，名称订单详细信息编码为 Order\_x0020\_详细信息。For example, the name Order Details is encoded as Order\_x0020\_Details. 下划线字符不需要转义，除非它后面跟有一个字符序列，并且在对名称解码时，该序列与下划线一起会被错误地解释为转义序列。The underscore character does not need to be escaped unless it is followed by a character sequence that together with the underscore can be misinterpreted as an escape sequence when decoding the name. 例如，Order\_详细信息不进行编码，但 Order\_x0020\_ 编码为 Order\_x005f\_x0020\_。For example, Order\_Details is not encoded, but Order\_x0020\_ is encoded as Order\_x005f\_x0020\_. 不允许 shortforms。No shortforms are allowed. 例如，不会生成窗体 \_x20\_ 和 \_\_。For example, the forms \_x20\_ and \_\_ are not generated. 此方法保证名称根据 XML 规范有效。This method guarantees the name is valid according to the XML specification. 它允许任意位置中的冒号，这意味着根据[W3C 命名空间规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)，名称可能仍然无效。It allows colons in any position, which means the name may still be invalid according to the [W3C Namespace Specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/). 为了保证它是有效的命名空间限定名称，请使用 作为前缀和本地名称部分，并使用冒号联接结果。To guarantee it is a valid namespace qualified name use for the prefix and local name parts and join the result with a colon. ## Examples 下面的示例对名称进行编码和解码。The following example encodes and decodes names. [!code-cpp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CPP/convert.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CS/convert.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/VB/convert.vb#1)]

Public Shared Function EncodeNmToken (name As String) As String

summary.span: 根据 XML 规范验证该名称是否有效。

span.span: Verifies the name is valid according to the XML specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可保证根据 XML 规范名称有效。This method guarantees that the name is valid according to the XML specification. 例如，如果您向此方法传递了无效名称 70 +，则它将返回 70\_x002b\_ 这是一个有效的 XML 名称。For example, if you passed this method the invalid name 70+, it returns 70\_x002b\_ which is a valid XML name. 如果 `name` 为 `null` 或字符串为空，则返回的值相同。If `name` is `null` or String.Empty then you get the same value returned.

returns.span: 与提供的字符串等效的 。

span.span: The equivalent of the supplied string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为秒的小数部分指定了7个以上的数字，则值将舍入。When more than seven digits are specified for fractional seconds, the value is rounded. 例如，00000004变为0000000，而00000005变为0000001。For example, 00000004 becomes 0000000 and 00000005 becomes 0000001. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从 XML 文件读取字符串，并使用 方法将字符串转换为 类型。The following example demonstrates how to read a string from an XML file and use the method to convert the string to a type. [!code-csharp[XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1/CS/XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1/VB/XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1.vb#1)] 该示例使用事务 .xml 文件。The example uses the transactions.xml file. ```xml 123456789 1.00 USD 2007-08-03T22:05:13-07:00 ```

exception.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 XML 架构规范的 dateTime 部分。

span.span: For more information, see the dateTime section of the XML Schema specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在输入字符串中指定的偏移量将导致 DateTimeOffset 的反序列化表示溢出，则会引发 FormatException。If the offset specified within the input string will cause an overflow in the deserialized representation of the DateTimeOffset, a FormatException is thrown. 如果为秒的小数部分指定了7个以上的数字，则值将舍入。When more than seven digits are specified for fractional seconds, the value is rounded. 例如，00000004变为0000000，而00000005变为0000001。For example, 00000004 becomes 0000000 and 00000005 becomes 0000001. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从 XML 文件读取字符串，并使用 方法将字符串转换为 类型。The following example demonstrates how to read a string from an XML file and use the method to convert the string to a type. 转换之前，将根据指定的格式验证输入字符串。The input string is validated against the specified format before being converted. MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string VerifyPublicId(string publicId) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyPublicId (publicId As String) As String

param.name: publicId
param.span: 包含要验证的 ID 的 。

span.span: that contains the id to validate.

summary.span: 如果字符串自变量中的所有字符都是有效的公共 ID 字符，则返回传入的字符串实例。

span.span: Returns the passed in string instance if all the characters in the string argument are valid public id characters.

returns.span: 如果自变量中的所有字符都是有效的公共 ID 字符，则为传入字符串。

span.span: The passed-in string if all the characters in the argument are valid public id characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值不应大于传入的参数。No other values than the passed in argument should be returned. 有效的公共 id 字符不会因 XML 版本而异，因此不需要 `XmlVersion` 重载。The characters valid for public id do not vary between XML editions, so no `XmlVersion` overload is required. 有关允许的字符的详细信息，请参阅[XML 1.0 spec （第四版）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985)生产 [13] `PubidChar`See [XML 1.0 spec (fourth edition)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985) production [13] `PubidChar` for details on the allowed characters 如果参数为 null，则会引发 `ArgumentNullException`。If the parameter is null, an `ArgumentNullException` will be thrown. 如果任何字符都不是有效的公共 id 字符，则会引发 `XmlException`，其中包含有关遇到的第一个无效字符的信息。If any of the characters are not valid public id characters, an `XmlException` is thrown with information about the first invalid character encountered.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string VerifyTOKEN(string token) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyTOKEN (token As String) As String

span.span: The string value you wish to verify.

summary.span: 根据“W3C 的 XML 架构第 2 部分：数据类型建议”，验证字符串是否有效。

span.span: Verifies that the string is a valid token according to the W3C XML Schema Part2: Datatypes recommendation.

returns.span: 标记（如果它是有效的标记）。

span.span: The token, if it is a valid token.

exception.span: 该属性值不是有效的标记。

span.span: The string value is not a valid token.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string VerifyWhitespace(string content) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyWhitespace (content As String) As String

summary.span: 如果字符串参数中的所有字符都是有效的空白字符，则返回传入的字符串实例。

span.span: Returns the passed-in string instance if all the characters in the string argument are valid whitespace characters.

returns.span: 如果字符串参数中的所有字符都是有效的空白字符，则为传入字符串实例；否则为 。

span.span: The passed-in string instance if all the characters in the string argument are valid whitespace characters, otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值不应大于传入的参数。No other values than the passed in argument should be returned. 对空格有效的字符不会因 XML 版本而异，因此不需要 xml 版本重载。The characters that are valid for whitespace do not vary between XML editions, so no xml version overload is required. 有关允许的字符的详细信息，请参阅[XML 1.0 规范（第四版）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985)生产 [3] S。See [XML 1.0 spec (fourth edition)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985) production [3] S for details on the allowed characters. 如果参数为 null，则会引发 `ArgumentNullException`。If the parameter is null, an `ArgumentNullException` will be thrown. 如果任何字符都不是有效的空白字符，则会引发 `XmlException`，其中包含有关遇到的第一个无效字符的信息。If any of the characters are not valid whitespace characters, an `XmlException` is thrown with information about the first invalid character encountered. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法来检测指定给 start 元素的值中是否存在无效字符。The following example uses the method to detect the presence of an invalid character in a value assigned to the start element. [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.NewVerify#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlconvert.newverify/cs/xmlconvertnewverify.cs#5)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.NewVerify#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlconvert.newverify/vb/xmlconvertnewverify.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string VerifyXmlChars(string content) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyXmlChars (content As String) As String

summary.span: 如果字符串自变量中的所有字符和代理项对字符都是有效的 XML 字符，则返回传入的字符串；否则将引发 并提供有关遇到的第一个无效字符的信息。

span.span: Returns the passed-in string if all the characters and surrogate pair characters in the string argument are valid XML characters, otherwise an is thrown with information on the first invalid character encountered.

returns.span: 如果字符串参数中的所有字符和代理项对字符都是有效的 XML 字符，则为传入字符串；否则将引发 并提供有关遇到的第一个无效字符的信息。

span.span: The passed-in string if all the characters and surrogate-pair characters in the string argument are valid XML characters, otherwise an is thrown with information on the first invalid character encountered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值不应大于传入的参数。No other values than the passed in argument should be returned. 有关允许的字符的详细信息，请参阅[XML 1.0 spec （第四版）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985)生产 [2] `Char`。See [XML 1.0 spec (fourth edition)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985) production [2] `Char` for details on the allowed characters. 如果参数为 null，则会引发 `ArgumentNullException`。If the parameter is null, an `ArgumentNullException` will be thrown. 如果任何字符都不是有效的 xml 字符，则会引发 `XmlException`，其中包含有关遇到的第一个无效字符的信息。If any of the characters are not valid xml characters, an `XmlException` is thrown with information on the first invalid character encountered. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法来检测 start 元素中的非法字符。The following example uses the method used to detect an illegal character in the start element. [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.NewVerify#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlconvert.newverify/cs/xmlconvertnewverify.cs#3)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.NewVerify#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlconvert.newverify/vb/xmlconvertnewverify.vb#3)]
